com.idibon.api.model

Class DocumentSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idibon.api.model.DocumentSearcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Either<IOException,Document>>

    public class DocumentSearcher
extends Object
implements Iterable<Either<IOException,Document>>
    Class for searching for Documents in a Collection by text, date, annotation features, or other aspects, and then iterating over the results.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DocumentSearcher.ReturnData
      Types of data that can be returned in various search modes.
      static class  DocumentSearcher.Sort
      Result sort order options.

    • Method Detail

      • returning

        public DocumentSearcher returning(DocumentSearcher.ReturnData... returnValues)
        Configure the search iterator to include additional return data. By default, only the Document name will be returned from the server. If needed, additional data may be returned. Depending on the data requested, this may invalidate certain search capabilities.
        Parameters:
        returnValues - Array of ReturnData enumerants of data that should be included.

      • excluding

        public DocumentSearcher excluding(DocumentSearcher.ReturnData... excludeValues)
        Excludes the specified extra return data from the search results. See returning(com.idibon.api.model.DocumentSearcher.ReturnData...).
        Parameters:
        excludeValues - Array of ReturnData enumerants of data that do not need to be returned.

      • first

        public DocumentSearcher first(long count)
        Limits the search to just the first count results.
        Parameters:
        count - The maximum number of search results to return.

      • first

        public DocumentSearcher first()
        Limits the search to the first result. Shorthand for first(1)

      • ignoring

        public DocumentSearcher ignoring(long count)
        Ignores the first count search results.
        Parameters:
        count - The number of matching documents to skip before returning the first result.

      • thatIncludes

        public DocumentSearcher thatIncludes(String text)
        Searches for documents that include the provided text string in the content field. This search feature is only supported when the requested return data is either empty, or only DocumentContent.
        Parameters:
        text - String to use for content matching.

      • annotated

        public DocumentSearcher annotated(DocumentAnnotationQuery query)
        Search for documents with annotations matching the annotation query.
        Parameters:
        query - Defines the annotation search terms.

      • sortedBy

        public DocumentSearcher sortedBy(DocumentSearcher.Sort sortOption)
        Configure the search result ordering
        Parameters:
        sortOption - The order that results should be returned.

      • ascending

        public DocumentSearcher ascending()
        Returns results sorted in ascending order.

      • descending

        public DocumentSearcher descending()
        Returns results sorted in descending order.

      • usingFeaturesFrom

        public DocumentSearcher usingFeaturesFrom(String task)
        Specifies a task whose features should be used as the return data when TaskFeatures are included with the return data. When TaskFeatures are returned and a task filter has been specified, the return data will include the features from the first task specified. However, if no task filter is used, or features from a different task are desired, use this method to define the feature generator.
        Parameters:
        task - Name of a task

      • iterator

        public Iterator<Either<IOException,Document>> iterator()
        Validates the current search configuration, sends the request to the server, and returns the results of the query.
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface Iterable<Either<IOException,Document>>
